spec_data.Name: un-core-fonts-common
spec_data.Description:
The UN set of Korean TrueType fonts is derived from the HLaTeX Type1 fonts
made by Koaunghi Un in 1998. They were converted to TrueType with
FontForge(PfaEdit) by Won-kyu Park in 2003.
The Un Core set is composed of:

- UnBatang: serif
- UnDinaru: fantasy
- UnDotum: sans-serif
- UnGraphic: sans-serif style
- UnGungseo: cursive, brush-stroke
- UnPilgi: script

This package consists of files used by other un-core-fonts packages.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:43:09 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Common files of Un Core fonts
